data.description: Use other catalog formats in Maketext
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides lexicon-handling modules to read from other
    local- ization formats, such as Gettext, Msgcat, and so on. It helps
    adoption of the Locale::Maketext framework by allowing users to
    manage lexicon files in the ubiquitous Gettext .po format, or store
    them in a tied database. CPANPLUS, RT and various other projects has
    been using this module for their I18N needs with success.

    See http://aut.dyndns.org/webl10n/ for an introduction to this
    module and its methodology.
